duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide application support for Anaplan and other systems, ensuring smooth operation and resolving technical issues.
Lead and manage a team of junior staff to deliver effective application support and contribute to full life cycle implementations.
Mentor and guide junior staff to enhance their skills and knowledge in application support and related areas.
Utilize technical skills in Excel, SQL, and data modeling to analyze, troubleshoot, and optimize system performance.
Address complex technical issues by applying problem-solving and analytical skills, ensuring seamless system operation.
Communicate effectively with stakeholders at all levels, understanding their requirements and providing appropriate support and solutions.
Collaborate in an Agile development environment, contributing to the continuous improvement of application support processes and tools.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
